lead_paragraph: Jack Nicklaus II tried to keep it as simple as possible as a caddie: Keep the clubs clean, get the right yardage and let his father do the rest.

headline.print_headline: Nicklaus' Son Rides Shotgun on Amazing 1986 Masters Victory
headline.main: Nicklaus' Son Rides Shotgun on Amazing 1986 Masters Victory
